hero.title: Ịnyere Obodo Aka Site na Nzụkọ Doro Anya
hero.subtitle: Na-eme ka ọrụ mmepe obodo dị mfe site na platform anyị maka nzụkọ, njikwa ego, na nlekọta ọrụ.

features.title: Isi Ngalaba
features.subtitle: Ịnyere Obodo Aka Site na Teknụzụ

communityEngagement.title: Ntụgharị Uche Obodo
communityEngagement.description: Na-enye obodo ohere ịbanye na usoro nzụkọ gọọmentị.

budgetManagement.title: Njikwa Ego
budgetManagement.description: Usoro dị mfe maka ịkesa na ịnyocha ego maka ọrụ obodo.

projectOversight.title: Nlekọta Ọrụ
projectOversight.description: Usoro zuru ezu maka ịnyocha na ịtụle ọrụ mmepe obodo.

securePayments.title: Ịkwụ Ụgwọ Nchekwa
securePayments.description: Usoro doro anya na dị mma maka ịkwụ ụgwọ ọrụ obodo.

cta.title: Ị Kwadebere Ịgbanwe Obodo Gị?
cta.subtitle: Banye na Platform Nzụkọ Obodo taa wee bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-agbanwe ihe.
